name: plant-mama-deployed
description: A scalable, user-focused, e-commerce MERN app featuring a graphql API.
author: ginadrcoder@gmail.com

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
